name: Fish Game: The Game
description:
Oh NO!
You are a little tiny puffer fish attempting to escape from your worst enemy in nature: A flipped upside down shark

Control the puffer fish and it's puff times!

At your biggest version , you can block the tiniest version, you can escape, BUT(T) when you're in the middle of your amazing transformation, you can use your own body as a projectile and hurt the shark.
